traits.name: Toxic Revenge
traits.description: Has Deathburst: Splash (self): 1 plague, and 1 toxic damage to already plagued foes.

traits.name: Thrall
traits.description: 2 of these units are worth 1 unit slot. Can be activated two at a time.

abilities.name: Pseudopod
abilities.description: Effect: Pull unit one space. This gains +1 range and pull for each plague token on this unit.

upgrades.name: Bloat
upgrades.description: Toxic Revenge's splash effect pushes 1 if this unit is plagued.

upgrades.name: Tentacle Whip
upgrades.description: Pseudopod inflicts 1 slow on plagued units.

upgrades.name: Aftermath
upgrades.description: Toxic Revenge leaves a hazard instead of a corpse.

traits.name: Deathburst
traits.description: Has Deathburst: Splash (self): Remove any 1 token from all units in the area.

abilities.name: Suppurate
abilities.description: Effect: Unit permanently gains death burst: splash (self): 1 toxic damage and 1 plague. This effect cannot stack with itself but stacks with other death burst effects.

abilities.name: Evolve Strain
abilities.description: Effect: Strip all plague tokens from unit in range. Foes take 1 toxic damage. Then, they gain 1 slow per token removed. Allies gain 1 strength per token removed.

abilities.name: Swell with Corruption
abilities.description: Effect: Unit triggers deathburst without being slain.

upgrades.name: Massive Swell
upgrades.description: Swell with corruption has a 4+ effect chance to trigger twice.

upgrades.name: Pandemic
upgrades.description: Removes 1 plague from all adjacent characters instead, with the same effects.

upgrades.name: Acid Blood
upgrades.description: Suppurate also grants deathburst: Create a hazard instead of a corpse.

traits.name: Swarm Release
traits.description: Has deathburst: Create a hazard under a number of units in range equal to the number of plague tokens on this unit.

abilities.name: Propagate Swarm
abilities.description: Effect: Create one (3+), two, or (5+) three hazards in range. Inflict a plague token to a unit adjacent to each hazard when created.

abilities.name: Driving Vermin
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage and pull 1, and +1 damage if target is standing in a hazard. Infect: 1 damage and pull 1.

upgrades.name: Swarm Feed
upgrades.description: May spend plague tokens on self to grant Driving Vermin +1D per token spent.

upgrades.name: Toxic Auger
upgrades.description: Immune to hazards, while standing in a hazard, increase the range of all abilities by +2.

upgrades.name: Defiler
upgrades.description: Driving Vermin gains effect (5+): create a hazard under target.

traits.name: Vile Rupture
traits.description: This unit has deathburst: Remove up to three plague tokens on this unit, then splash (self): 1 toxic damage, once, per plague token removed.

abilities.name: Percolate
abilities.description: Effect: Inflict two, (5+) or three plague on self, then may inflict 1 slow on an adjacent unit per plague token gained.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Effect: MOVE with free movement in a straight line. During this move, is immune to hazards and may move through walls and units. Any foe this unit passes through takes 1 toxic damage and this unit may pass off any plague tokens on this unit to affected units.

upgrades.name: Rotten Surge
upgrades.description: After Surge, inflict 1 plague on self for each unit passed through.

upgrades.name: Sticky Trail
upgrades.description: During Surge, may create a hazard in one space passed through.

upgrades.name: The Gunk
upgrades.description: Surge inflicts 2 slow on the first unit affected.

traits.name: Blessed with Filth
traits.description: Immune to hazards. At turn start, gain 1 plague, then may distribute any number of plague tokens on this unit to any other units in range 2.

abilities.name: Virulence
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage and inflict 1 plague. Effect: Then, may immediately remove a plague token on target to deal 1 toxic damage, again (3+) one more, (5+) one more.

upgrade.name: Pollution Shroud
upgrade.description: While standing in a hazard, you have cover from all directions and are curseproof.

upgrade.name: Corruptor
upgrade.description: After you MOVE, create a hazard in an adjacent space.

upgrade.name: Spreader
upgrade.description: Infect abilities that you use or that target you may jump an extra time.

upgrade.name: Melt
upgrade.description: Unit takes 1 toxic damage, ignoring armor. If this reduces it to 0 hp, it is obliterated and it melts, creating a hazard in its space.

upgrade.name: Corpse Explosion
upgrade.description: Choose a corpse in range. It explodes for a splash effect centered on it for 1 plague and push 1. Then remove it and replace it with a hazard.

upgrade.name: Vermin Form
upgrade.description: Choose a corpse or a hazard in range and and swap places with it. You push all adjacent units 1 and become curseproof until the end of your next turn.

upgrade.name: Ceaseless Spew
upgrade.description: Effect: 1 plague (6+) or 2 plague. Already plagued foes take 1 toxic damage. Pull all affected units 1.

upgrade.name: Flesh Feeder Blade
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 damage and Infect: 1 plague to foes and 1 strength to self or allied units. Double this effect if it slays a foe.

upgrade.name: Scourge
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 damage and create a hazard under target (3+) and slow them (5+) twice.

upgrade.name: Necrocide
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 toxic damage. Infect: 1 toxic damage. Effect: After this ability resolves, gain 1 plague on self for each unit affected.

upgrade.name: Purge Guts
upgrade.description: Effect: Remove up to three plague tokens from self or allied unit and grant them to any other adjacent unit to target. Then, remove a negative token on the target for each plague token removed.

upgrade.name: Insides Out
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Unit gains 1 slow and creates a hazard under themselves at the end of this turn.

upgrade.name: Fecundity
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Double all plague tokens on a unit. If this puts them at 5 or more tokens, they also explode with splash (target): 1 toxic damage.

upgrade.name: Unholy Vapors
upgrade.description: Trigger: Target turn start. Effect: At the end of the targeted unit’s turn, targeted unit takes 1 toxic damage, ignoring armor, for every hazard in range 2 of them.

upgrade.name: Praise the Filth
upgrade.description: Effect: Place one hazard in range for every other hazard in range.

upgrade.name: Mox Populi
upgrade.description: Effect: Remove up to four corpse tokens or hazards and summon a SCUM unit for each. Then splash (target) on all scum created this way for 1 toxic damage to foes. Characters can only be damaged once by this effect.
